collections.title: Discover Timeless Pieces
collections.craftsmanshipDescription: Each piece is handcrafted with precision and passion, using only the finest materials to ensure lasting beauty and elegance.

about.historyDescription: Caspian Jewellery is a jewellery company based in the United Arab Emirates (Dubai) specializing in diamond and gold jewellery for over 25 years, established in 1997.
about.tourDescription: Every guest visiting the factory has an opportunity to take a production tour, acknowledge and witness the essence and elegance of jewellery manufacturing with semi precious colour stones, as well as precious diamond stones in all its shapes and designs.
about.designDescription: The experience collected throughout many years of manufacturing brought our designs to a whole new level. Everyone has an opportunity to dig into their imagination and customize their own jewellery. It is as simple as drawing your desired jewellery item on a piece of paper and handing it to our CAD team to make your dream jewellery. After a few awaited days, you can finally try on the jewellery of your fantasies!
about.transferDescription: Our company provides free transfer services for guests from their location to our factory and back.

text1.title: Crafting Timeless Elegance
text1.subtitle: Discover the Art of Caspian Jewellery

contacts.title: Contact Us
contacts.description: Feel free to reach out to us for any inquiries or assistance.
